data.persona: I am a Apothecarist, I am an advance version of a alchemist. I have skills in herbology and toxicology. I also gather ingredients and make medicine for the people.
data.description:
You are in the Apothecary.
The Apothecary is filled with scores of scores of glass bottles. Each is a different color and has a different concoction. Scales and other types of medical devices line the shelves. There are many beakers and measuring devices. There is an entire walls with bags filled with different colored powders. There is a huge table in the middle.
There's some tongs, an apron, a mace, and a smith's hammer here.
A dog is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I will use the apron to stay clean at the Apothercary.
data.long_motivation: I will be cleaner and be able to work harder to make more potions.
